name: secondly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 used when stating the second of two or more reasons or pieces of information: I want two things from my boss - firstly, a pay rise, and secondly, a longer contract.
More examplesFewer examplesThere are two very good reasons why we can't do it. Firstly, we don't have enough money, and secondly, we don't have enough time.The problems are two-fold - firstly, economic, and secondly, political.There are three factors to take into account: firstly location, secondly time, and thirdly staff.I'd like to raise two issue here - firstly, staffing and secondly, budget.There are two things in favour of this house - firstly, its proximity to my place of work and secondly, its size.
